replies.msg: 希望大家都食得健康啲

Last week my friend asked me if I wanted to join him for supper at his place. I replied in the affirmative. We washed two boxes of rice salad and left the salad to dry out before eating it. In this way the rice salad contains more nutrients than when you consume it right after opening the lid. We diced the meat and the potatoes. We cut the peppers into dice. We were careful because the knife has a razor-sharp edge.
